name: historikie
description: Browser extension for searching browser history with a beautiful popup interface (supports Chrome and Firefox)

scripts.package:chrome: rm -f historikie-chrome.zip && pnpm build:chrome && find dist-chrome -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && find dist-chrome -name '._*' -type f -delete && cd dist-chrome && zip -r ../historikie-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: rm -f historikie-firefox.zip && pnpm build:firefox && find dist-firefox -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && find dist-firefox -name '._*' -type f -delete && cd dist-firefox && zip -r ../historikie-firefox.zip .

author: bossm0n5t3r
